refnamediv.refpurpose: Select region of interest and create a mask from it

refsynopsisdiv.title: Syntax
refsynopsisdiv.synopsis: imout = imroi(imin [, nr_points ]) imout = imroi(imin [, points ])

listitem.para: Maximum number of points to select with mouse - a positive integer (the default value is 10)
a 2xN matrix of points; if present the region is defined by points and no interactive mouse selection is used

refsection.title: Description
refsection.para: The first calling sequence is used to provide interactive way to select up to nr_points points (or up to 10 points, if nr_points is not given) by using right mouse button to select the last point, and points are used to create the image mask.
The second calling sequence is used to create a mask from a region defined by a Nx2 matrix points which has the form [x1,y1;x2,y2;...;xN,yN], where (xi,yi), i=1..N are vertices of the region.
